account0 = web3.eth.accounts[0]
account1 = web3.eth.accounts[1]
account2 = web3.eth.accounts[2]
account3 = web3.eth.accounts[3]
account4 = web3.eth.accounts[4]
account5 = web3.eth.accounts[5]
account6 = web3.eth.accounts[6]
account7 = web3.eth.accounts[7]
account8 = web3.eth.accounts[8]
account9 = web3.eth.accounts[9]
microgrid.deployed().then(inst => { microgridinst = inst })


microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(0, account0, 46452, "Gartland 1")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(1, account1, 46452, "Gartland 2")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(2, account2, 46452, "Fontaine")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(3, account3, 27871, "Foy 1")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(4, account4, 27871, "Foy 2")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(5, account5, 27871, "Foy 3")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(6, account6, 65033, "Dyson")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(7, account7, 68130, "Lowell-Thomas")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(8, account8, 57807, "Hancock")
microgridinst.registerSmartMeter(9, account9, 78453, "Library")

microgridinst.getSmartMeter(9)

WINTER

microgridinst.setSmartMeterThresholdArray([46452, 46452, 46452, 27871, 27871, 27871, 65033, 68130, 57807, 78453])
microgridinst.setSmartMeterThresholdArray([60208, 60208, 60208, 36124, 36124, 36124, 84291, 88305, 74925, 101685])
